name: Tuna Casserole
preparation: In a sauté pan or wok, stir together seasoning with milk. Stir in water and egg noodles. Cover; bring to a boil.
Reduce heat to medium; uncover, and cook for 10 min, stirring frequently.
Stir in peas and tuna. Cook until heated through, 1–2 more min.
tips: Customize it your way; pack in more veggies along with the peas. Try steamed broccoli florets, zucchini coins, or sautéed mushrooms.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1 cup leafy green salad with 1 tbsp Epicure dressing.
